code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ServerTest(){const[status,setStatus]=useState('Testing...');const[details,setDetails]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const testServer=async()=>{try{console.log('Testing server connection...');const response=await fetch('http://localhost:3001/test');const data=await response.json();setStatus('✅ Server connected!');setDetails(JSON.stringify(data,null,2));console.log('Server test successful:',data);}catch(error){setStatus('❌ Server connection failed');setDetails(error.message);console.error('Server test failed:',error);}};testServer();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'20px',border:'1px solid #ccc',margin:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Server Connection Test"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Status:"})," ",status]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("pre",{style:{background:'#f5f5f5',padding:'10px',fontSize:'12px'},children:details})]});}
